mapper.select: select bo1.no, bo1.title, bo1.content, bo1.hit, bo1.user_no as userno, us.name as name from board1 bo1 left join users us on bo1.user_no = us.no order by bo1.no asc

select bo.no, bo.title, bo.content, bo.hit, to_char(bo.eg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regdate, bo.user_no as userno, us.name name from board bo left join users us on bo.user_no = us.no where bo.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board values (seq_board_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, default, sysdate, #{userNo} )
